```{r getting steam data}

library(tidyverse)
library(zoo)

gamenames <- readr::read_csv('https://raw.githubusercontent.com/rfordatascience/tidytuesday/master/data/2021/2021-03-16/games.csv')

```


```{r clean data}
library(lubridate)

LIS <-gamenames %>% filter(str_detect(gamename,pattern = 'Life is Strange')) %>%
  mutate(year_month_day = parse_date(paste0(month, " ", year),"%B %Y"), peak_avg_diff = peak - avg) %>% 
  pivot_longer(cols=c(avg, peak_avg_diff), names_to = 'metric') %>% # 2 new columns, metric and value
  select(gamename, year_month_day, metric,value) %>%
  mutate(gamename = case_when(
  gamename == 'Life is Strange\u0099' ~ 'Life is Strange',
  TRUE ~ as.character(gamename)
))

LIS

```

test

```{r vis data}
library(pacman)
pacman::p_load(ggstream,showtext,cowplot,extrafont)
library(sysfonts)


background <- '#99c2f2'
palette <- c('#1e56a6','#804d2e','#b51d87')


test<-LIS %>%
  filter(metric =='avg') %>% 
  ggplot(aes(year_month_day , value , fill = gamename)) +
  geom_stream(extra_span = 0, alpha = 0.25) +
  geom_stream(type = "ridge" , bw = 0.75) +
  scale_fill_manual(values = palette) +
  scale_y_continuous(labels = scales::label_number_si(), 
                     breaks = seq(0 , 100000, 25000), 
                     position = "right")+
  annotate("text" , x = lubridate::date("2015-03-08"), y = -1000, label = "Source: streamcharts.com\nGraphic: @Mowgl_ii", 
           hjust = 0, size = 3, color = "White" , family = "Ink Free")+
   annotate("text" , x = lubridate::date("2015-02-01"), y = -250, label = "Average players on Steam", hjust = 0, size = 5, color = "White" , family = "Ink Free") +
  
  # Legends
  
  ## LIS
  
  annotate("linerange" , x = seq(date('2015-04-01'),date("2015-11-20"),'days'), ymin = -500, ymax = -700, size = 3 , color = palette[1]) +
  annotate("text" ,      x = date("2015-04-01"), y = -550, label = "LIS: 1", hjust = 0, 
           size = 3, color = "white" , family = "Ink Free") +
  

  ## LIS BS
  
  annotate("linerange" , x = seq(date('2017-02-01'),date("2018-04-10"),'days'), ymin = -500, ymax = -700, size = 3 , color = palette[3]) +
  annotate("text" , x = date("2017-02-01"), y = -550, label = "LIS: Before the Storm", hjust = 0, 
           size = 3, color = "white" , family = "Ink Free") +
  
  
  ## LIS 2
  
  annotate("linerange" , x = seq(date("2019-08-01"),date("2020-04-15"), 'days'), ymin = -500, ymax = -700, size = 3 , color = palette[2]) +
   annotate("text" , x = date("2019-08-01"), y = -550, label = "LIS: 2", hjust = 0, 
           size = 3, color = "white" , family = "Ink Free") +
 
  
  
  theme_void() +
  theme(plot.background = element_rect(fill = background),
        legend.position = "none",
        axis.title = element_blank(),
        axis.text.x = element_text(hjust = 0 , face = "bold" , size = 20 , color = "white" , family = "Ink Free"),
        axis.text.y.right = element_text(hjust = 0 , face = "bold" , size = 10 , color = "white" , family = "Ink Free"),
        panel.grid = element_blank(),
        plot.margin = margin(2.5,1,1,0, unit = "cm"))

test
```
